multinet.description: MultiNet is an open-source benchmark designed to evaluate Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models on a diverse set of tasks spanning vision, language, and robotic control. By consolidating high-quality datasets and standardizing evaluation metrics, MultiNet enables the development of generalist AI systems that integrate multimodal understanding with real-world action capabilities.

website.title: Website
website.description: Check out the MultiNet Project Website

multinet.title: MultiNet

vlm_calibration.description: This project evaluates and improves the calibration of vision language models (VLMs) on reasoning benchmarks like GSM8K and MMLU, analyzing their confidence estimates and accuracy. Through techniques like Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting, activation steering, and systematic sanity checks, we aim to reduce overconfidence and enhance models' ability to assess their own correctness.
vlm_calibration.title: VLM Calibration

modular_space_systems_assembly.description: This project explores autonomous multi-agent robotic assembly of modular space structures to enable scalable, adaptable, and resilient in-orbit construction. By developing novel guidance and control algorithms for free-flying and pivoting modular systems, we aim to improve the efficiency, scalability, and reconfiguration capabilities of future space infrastructure.
modular_space_systems_assembly.title: Modular Space Systems Assembly

multimodality.description: We are developing and testing new model architectures & network primitives to achieve massively multimodal, “Generalist” systems capable of doing useful things across images, natural language, and the physical and digital world.
multimodality.label: Multimodality

multinet.description: A Generalist Benchmark for Vision-Language & Action models
multinet.title: MultiNet

multimodality.title: Multimodality

metacognition.description: Metacognition helps agents evaluate and improve their decisions—critical for autonomy. Inspired by human cognition, we aim to benchmark and eventually build metacognitive abilities in these agents.
metacognition.label: Metacognition

vlm_calibration.description: Improving VLM self-assessment on reasoning benchmarks.
vlm_calibration.title: VLM Calibration

metacognition.title: Metacognition

swarm_intelligence.description: We’re exploring ways to enable swarms of robots to cooperate in a decentralized way, with an emphasis on real-time adaptation to out-of-distribution changes to their environments or scenarios.
swarm_intelligence.label: Swarm Intelligence

modular_space_systems_assembly.description: Swarm robotics for in-orbit assembly and reconfiguration.
modular_space_systems_assembly.title: Modular Space Systems Assembly

swarm_intelligence.title: Swarm Intelligence

generative_biology.description: We’re exploring the application of foundation class models to biological problems, including drug discovery, feature detection, protein mapping, and more. Currently in an exploratory capacity, stay tuned for project details.
generative_biology.label: Generative Biology
generative_biology.title: Generative Biology
